data.eml:eml: A new phytotelmatic species of Monopelopia Fittkau, 1962 (Insecta: Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae) from South Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendes, Humberto Fonseca, Marcondes, Carlos Brisola, Pinho, Luiz Carlos De (2003): A new phytotelmatic species of Monopelopia Fittkau, 1962 (Insecta: Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae) from South Brazil. Zootaxa 262: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156266
